Test Case:
a = 10
b = 20
c = a + b
show 'Sum is $(c)'

items = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd']
array_remove(items, 1)
show 'After removal, new index 1: $(items[1])'

score = 85
if score >= 90
    show 'Grade: A'
elif score >= 75
    show 'Grade: B'
else
    show 'Grade: C'
close

try
    x = 10 / 0
fail
    show 'Err... zero!'
always
    show 'This always executes.'
close

fn multiply(x)
    result = x * x
    ret result
close

square = multiply(5)
show '$(square)'

for i in range(0, 10)
    if i == 5
        skip
    close
    if i == 8
        stop
    close
    show '$(i)'
close

show 'Enter: '
v = read
v = int(v)
v = float(v)
show 'Converted'
show 'Done'

i = 10
while i > 0
    show '$(i)'
    i = i - 1
close
